item.title: 7.1 Practice
item.description:
Ex1.

A vector $\vec{v}$ has an $x$-component of $-2$ and a $y$-component of $5$. Write the vector in component form.

Solution

The vector in component form is:

$$ \vec{v} = (-2, 5). $$

Answer:
The vector in component form is $ \boxed{\vec{v} = (-2, 5)} $.
